signposting:
You can now procure online with CCS.

Please sign in or create an account.
title_h2_1: Buy online using our contract award service
second_title_list:
Contract Award Service (CAS) is scalable solution that will support:
  • Further Competition (FC) - aka Request for Proposal (RFP) or Invitation To Tender (ITT)
  • Direct Award (DA)
  • Request for Information (RFI)
  • Capability Assessment
second_title_line1: To use this service you will need to sign in to, or create an account for, the Public Procurement Gateway.
second_title_line2: The Public Procurement Gateway helps you to access the different procurement services available to the public sector.
buttonText_signout: Sign in or create an account
title_h2_2: The agreements below are available on our service
